description:
Welcome to my clean, peaceful, and bright studio on a quiet street that is a 5 minute walk to 2 subway stations. 

This apartment faces the courtyard garden of the building behind it, so it is very quiet and peaceful and gets a lot of light. The kitchen is fully equipped with cooking utensils, espresso machine for coffee lovers, and a Vitamix blender, while the bathroom has a skylight!

It is located 4 blocks away from the train station, which will take you to Times Square in 15 minutes, Union Square in 20 minutes, and Soho & downtown in 20-25 minutes. It is also a 15 minute walk to Central Park and Carl Schurz Park, another great park on the East River. It is also a 18 minute walk to Museum Mile!

Multiple grocery stores, and many restaurants and cafes are located within a one block radius. Starbucks, Oslo Coffee, Gregory's, Le Pain Quotidian, multiple Thai/Chinese/Japanese take out places are situated very close by. 

The studio space features a living room, bathroom and kitchen. There is a comfortable single bed so this is suitable for someone traveling alone and wanting a quiet and peaceful space to come home to after a busy day in the city. A work desk is also provided. If you play music, you have use of the electric piano if you like. 

No smoking, no pets please.

I will be available 24/7 by phone if needed.
name: Private Studio in a superb location
review:
Excelente departamento en la ciudad de NY. Muy bien ubicado, a solo unos pasos del Metro Q en la E72st. Hay varios locales a su alrededor para tener tus cosas necesarias del día a día. El departamento es ideal para una pareja, tiene de todo y está muy bien lindo y cuidado por Li.
Ella es una adorable persona, comunicativa y muy acogedora. Solo le recomiendo que vea el tema de la dirección y números de su departamento con Airbnb. Disfruten, les encantará ese departamento. 100% recomendado y volvería encantado. Cariños Li.
